summary: a mod that adds a bow and arrow that wont do any damage
descriptionHtml:
i bet your woundering why would i make this well its simple in the thieves guild questline you cant kill and so many times ive shoot a arrow tiped with aÂ paralysis poison to only kill them and not get paid and you can shoot arrows in guards knees and not get in trouble.
NOTE YOU CAN NOT MAKE THESE YET!
as far as i know you can not make the bow and arrow yet to get them in game hit ` then type in
player.additem 01000d62
for the bow
player.additem 01000d63
NOTE THE ID WILL CHANGE
the id will change depending on what it is in your load order
so if its 4th in your load order it will be 0400.....
when installed in nexus mod maniger look under load order to find the first two didgits.
and lastly this mod was made in about 5 seconds by editing the damage of a bow and arrow so no donations needed at all its just a edited long bow and iron arrow but if you want to i wont stop you.
author: bloxrocks
